product_name: Sea to Summit Pocket Hand Wash
long_description: The compact Sea To Summit Pocket Hand Wash slips easily into a toiletry bag or backpack pocket so you'll always be armed with soap when traveling or camping. Small plastic case holds 50 thin leaves of soap; remove leaves with dry hands and dissolve in water to use as liquid soap. Soap is biodegradable and phosphate free. Soap has a light green tea fragrance. Compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: The compact Sea To Summit Pocket Hand Wash slips easily into a toiletry bag or backpack pocket so you'll always be armed with soap when traveling or camping.
